title: Good matchups vs Cassiopeia?
body: For one of the absolute best late game champions in the game her level 2/3 cheese is really stupid... Not just me crying about it happening to me either, I do it all the time and I just feel fucken dirty lol. It doesn't seem fair, Ryze and Vayne have really bad early games, why doesn't Cass? Anyway I'm not crying for nerfs, what are some good IN LANE matchups?

replies.body: As much as she has great poke, I hear that her range isn't as large as most other poke champs. Because of this I imagine that Xerath or Nidalee would be able to out-range her and therefore out-poke her. Also, the jungler helps heaps.

Xerath yes, Nidalee no.

Honestly nidalee struggles in a laning phase regardless, but Cassio is one you just have to sit back and farm in.

Hitting spears in Laning is nearly impossible.
Yeah Nidalee has a shiiiiitty laning phase. And I really hate playing Xerath in SoloQ. So helpless lol

Vel'koz
Ziggs
Orianna
Actually I played against Cass twice yesterday. I won with Ori (not hard but I did win lane) and I got rekt with Ahri.

Ahri into a cassio lane would probably aim more for the roams over the in lane fights.

Play safe farm till you can get a gank or roam, charm the cassio in a gank and she is basically fucked.
But if she was ever able to land poison one me ONCE I was fucked.
Not exactly ture though. First of all, she probably has to land it twice. Also, if you are playing a ranged champ, it's really REALLY hard to land poison on you.

I honestly didn't know. I have never played Nidalee and I have heard that she is mediocre at best in lane. I was mostly using it as an example to say that long range immobile mages will be able to deal with Cass. A better example probably would have been Vel'Koz.
Try ancient coin ap shaco mid, https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ssyFrq7yuok. The cheese is on an entirely different plane of existence.
Zilean counters everyone with Groovy Zilean skim milk. Hihly recommend.

Wukong is pretty good. You can outtrade her super hard level 1 to stop her all in level 2-3 and kill her every time your ult is up after 6.

Also, her mana costs got nerfed pretty hard so once you dodge a few qs or heal up her damage, she wont have the mana to keep playing aggressive

jeez its only google search away but if you really need it.

http://www.championselect.net/champions/cassiopeia

Honestly that is a meh site.

Example: Graves jungler goes even with Cassiopeia.

Not to mention i would hazard a guess this was pre-rework Cassio as Galio isn't really a hard counter any more (she's not poison focused like she once was.)

The site in general should only be taken loosely as a guide.

EDIT: This is a better one for specific counters

http://champion.gg/champion/Cassiopeia/Middle
malz or cho their silences kinda screw's up your e spam
Learn how to dodge her Q m8

>Ryze have really bad early games

I believe you missed what new ryze can do.

^^

Once he has a somewhat stacked tear, he has enough mana to be able to spam all his abilities. Once he hits 3 and gets all his abilities, he can be quite scary with his damage.
Oh, sorry I actually haven't seen one.. lol
Exactly, nobody plays him much anymore because he is "out of meta" apparently. What people don't realise is that you can build him as a tank with several mana items like Frozen Heart and such.

This is not the case at all, no one played him because his rework was shit, then he got some buffs and now his fotm because perma snare is OP and he now has the ability to do whatever the fuck he pleases if he can pull off a really simple combo.
Yeah that too xD
NA LCS shoutcasters: "QWE DO IT AGAIN!" Lol

I like to play Twisted Fate against Cass. You've got a stun, a slow, 2 damage nukes and the ability to either feed or get fed from your other lanes with superior roam ability.

Your Q as TF has one of the longest distances in the game.
